text: The Puerto Rico men's national 3x3 team () represents Puerto Rico in international 3x3 basketball matches and is controlled by the Puerto Rican Basketball Federation ().FIBA 3x3 World Cup Qualifier 2019 ==Competitive record== ===Record against other teams at the World Cup=== {| class="wikitable" style="width:25%;
